Title: Drive
Plot: Mulder is trapped in a car with a man who has developed a serious ear condition which can only be suppressed by driving west at high speeds. As Scully tries to find the cause and a cure for the problem, Mulder and the man get closer and closer to the ocean.
GuestStars: Bryan Cranston, Michael O'Neill, Harry Danner, Linda Porter, Mindy Seeger, Scott A. Smith, Tim Agee, Mark Craig, Wiley Pickett, Ken Collins, Tegan West, Tom Hale, Frank Buckley, Bob Peters, Janine Venable, Art Picke
